author: Wolverien

text:
@SupraDarky - cheers for posting this! It seems like a lifetime ago I was sitting carefree at home charging through gormless enemies in Spyro. All the clichés run true (you know, the stuff about older games being much better than the modern era). My answer to the question "why?" would be that games were made for those who played them, not those who financed them.

Keep posting the tunes, you're doing us all a great service :)

text:
Out of all gamefranchises, Spyro is the most ruined one. Even more ruined than Sonic was before Sonic 4!
